name: Grapher metadata for dataset_353_extreme_income_poverty_in_europe__bradshaw_and_mayhew__2011
description:
The authors use EU-SILC 2008 data to estimate "World Bank type extreme poverty rates".

They seem to estimate extreme poverty by translating the $1 and $2.15 per person per day poverty lines to European countries using PPP conversions. They do not explain
